titleStmt.title: An alarum to England to prevent its destruction by the loss of trade and navigation; which at this day is in great danger. Submitted to consideration in time.
titleStmt.author: Carter, W. (William)

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by K. Astwood, for Mary Fabian, at Mercers-Chappel in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
